Resilient Systems REST API: SessionOrgInfoDTO

  3. SessionOrgInfoDTO

SessionOrgInfoDTO Data Type

Contains the information about a user's status in an org in a session. It contains the information about the org, whether or not the org is currently accessible in the session, and the permissions for the user in the org.

Properties
name data type description
perms SessionOrgInfoPermsDTO
enabled boolean
Properties inherited from JustOrgDTO
number The ID of the organization.
string The name of the organization.
string The address of the organization (e.g. "123 Main Street").
string A second address line (e.g. "Suite 234").
string The city where the organization is located.
string The state where the organization is located (free-form text).
string The ZIP/postal code where the organization is located.
boolean Are attachments enabled for the organization? See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings and PUT /orgs/{orgId}/settings
boolean Is incident deletion allowed for the organization? See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings and PUT /orgs/{orgId}/settings
boolean Are tasks created as "private" (no members) by default? See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings and PUT /orgs/{orgId}/settings
boolean Are there SAML federations enabled for this organization? See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings
boolean Is SAML *required* for authentication into this organization? See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings and PUT /orgs/{orgId}/settings
number The duration that a two factor authentication cookie is valid for this org. See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings
TwoFactorAuthDomainDTO The two factor authentication domain that has been enabled for this org. If null. then the org does not have two factor authentication enabled. If set, then the user must successfully authenticate against this two factor authentication domain before they can access this org. See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings
boolean Are there any candidate two factor auth domains available for this org? See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings
string Is there an authorizing LDAP group for this org? See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings
boolean Is LDAP configured for this org? See GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings

Example

{
  "perms" : {
    "create_shared_layout" : true,
    "master_administrator" : true,
    "administrator" : true,
    "observer" : true,
    "create_incs" : true
  },
  "enabled" : true,
  "id" : 12345,
  "name" : "...",
  "addr" : "...",
  "addr2" : "...",
  "city" : "...",
  "state" : "...",
  "zip" : "..."
}
